attributes.action: How much of the NHS is already in private hand's ? Government to detail exactly?
attributes.additional_details: Health spending devolved in Greater Manchester - http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-manchester-35933922
attributes.background:
newly devolved Manchester health Care this is privatisation no matter how you call it, where is the Nation's interest as in National Health. 
BBC news report about London and Manchester health care devolving

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to make a statement to Parliament about the provision of NHS services by private companies.
